items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic and Comfy: My New Favorite Dress!
items.body: quality is outstanding. The material is super soft and feels great against the skin, although it’s a bit thick, so I wouldn’t recommend it for warmer weather. One of the best features is that it’s not see-through at all, which is a huge plus! For reference, I’m 5ft tall and weigh 138 lbs, and I got a Medium. The fit is perfect for me! The design is adorable, especially with the unique detailing at the sleeves and hem. I feel like the money I spent was 100% worth it. If you're considering this dress, go for it! You won't regret it! Read more
items.author: AK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth it!
items.body: love!! this dress is so cute. i’m 5’3 165lbs & i got a medium and it fits perfectly. it wasn’t too short like i’ve seen other mention. it has some stretch to it also because of the wonderful sweater materiel. i got it to wear as part of my halloween costume & to wear for other occasions also. (halloween pic included lol) Read more
items.author: Ellie Gaut

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short!
items.body: This dress was made for toddlers. It doesn't even cover my butt. If you are a average to tall size girly, skip this one. On the other hand super cute dress and nice material. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Cute
items.body: This is exactly as shown! 5’8 and 120lbs in a medium. Not see through. Soft and comfy material. So Cute Read more
items.author: TNM

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible Quality
items.body: If I could give no stars I would. First, it is not the same hemlines as shown in the photos. The bottom is pleated, not free flowing. Second, one hour into wearing it the wire was sticking out and coming undone from the both the sleeves and the skirt hem. Very disappointed. Read more
items.author: Alejandro O.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress, Perfect for Photos!
items.body: Elegant but very short I wore this Naileksi Ruffle Hem dress for my birthday pictures and got so many compliments! The material is perfect for cold days, and it’s really elegant. I’m 5’5 about 150 pounds and I got a size medium. Pros: • Beautiful, high-quality material • Perfect for photos or special occasions • Warm enough for cooler days Cons: • Very short — not ideal for wearing out in public Overall: If you want a stunning dress for pictures or indoor events, this is perfect. Just keep in mind the length! Read more
items.author: Esmi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short girls add this to your cart
items.body: Adorable! Perfect for short girls as it is on the shorter side. I’m 5ft and it is the perfect length for me. I love it with sheer tights and heels. Read more
items.author: Stormy McBride

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little black dress
items.body: Real cute. True to size. Not see through at all and decent quality. Received a lot of compliments my first time wearing it. Read more
items.author: Abby

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
